tests.report:
- The website is pretty bad on what is considered best practice, according to Google Lighthouse.
- Uses deprecated APIs ( 1.00 rating )
- Uses third-party cookies ( 1.00 rating )
- Uses HTTPS ( 5.00 rating )
- Browser errors were logged to the console ( 1.00 rating )
- Displays images with incorrect aspect ratio ( 1.00 rating )
- Issues were logged in the `Issues` panel in Chrome Devtools ( 1.00 rating )
- Allows users to paste into input fields ( 5.00 rating )
- Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale` ( 5.00 rating )
- Serves images with appropriate resolution ( 5.00 rating )
- Page has the HTML doctype ( 5.00 rating )
- Properly defines charset ( 5.00 rating )
- Avoids requesting the geolocation permission on page load ( 5.00 rating )
- Avoids requesting the notification permission on page load ( 5.00 rating )
- Document uses legible font sizes ( 5.00 rating )
- Page has valid source maps ( 5.00 rating )
- Ensure CSP is effective against XSS attacks ( 5.00 rating )
- Use a strong HSTS policy ( 5.00 rating )
- Detected JavaScript libraries ( 5.00 rating )
